cd:Union.name: GOME2_MDR_L1B_v6
cd:Union.cd:Description: Union of possible GOME L1b MDRs (format version 5). A definition for each of the record subclass values that are used in the field expression for this union can be found in the GOME-2 Level 1 PFS (EUM-MIS-SPE-97232).
cd:Union.cd:FieldExpression: if(int(:/RECORD_HEADER/INSTRUMENT_GROUP) == 5, if(int(:/RECORD_HEADER/RECORD_SUBCLASS) == 6, 0, if(int(:/RECORD_HEADER/RECORD_SUBCLASS) == 7, 1, if(int(:/RECORD_HEADER/RECORD_SUBCLASS) == 8, 2, if(int(:/RECORD_HEADER/RECORD_SUBCLASS) == 9, 3, 5)))), if(int(:/RECORD_HEADER/INSTRUMENT_GROUP) == 13 && int(:/RECORD_HEADER/RECORD_SUBCLASS) == 1, 4, 5))
